page.title: 08IMPORTANT LOCAL ISSUES
page.content:
Hagley, 56% were against. Objections were based on the belief that such an amenity would cause much litter, in addition to attracting crowds of youths. Connected to this last point many adults express concern at crowds of older{teenagers}collecting on West Hagley{Library car park}or outside The {Wine Keg.}Their complaints caused a bench outside the shop to be removed, but the{teenagers}remain.
{Entertainment.} It was common for 13-18 year olds to complain about{poor leisure provision. Hagley has a youth club, but many go as far afield as Birmingham for suitable entertainment. Many adults do not agree with these criticisms, pointing to Tennis, Badminton, Squash, Horse-Riding and Archery clubs.
